decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (ESB-001-011-000; S 9840; TFL_001 Rev: C; Design and Access Statement RC 743; Flood Risk Assessment Site: 743 Version 0.3 dated 18/09/2017. Received: 19/09/2017.
NE2017_0095B_743_101; NE2017_0095B_743_102; NE2017_0095B_743_103 Rev: 01. Received: 20/10/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - In accordance with Drawing No: NE2017_0095B_743_103 Rev: 01 - received: 20/10/2017, the road markings shown shall be in place prior to the commencement of the operational use of the hereby approved Electric Charging Point and associated works, and shall be permanently maintained as such to ensure access for all electric vehicles.
Condition : 5 - The cabling extending from the charging point to the vehicle shall be retractable when not in use and permanently maintained in such a manner.
description: Installation of a Rapid Charging Point, feeder pillar and associated works on the footpath and carriageway outside 35 Ellesmere Road (A4 Great West Road)
